casebody.data:
Billy W. WRIGHT, and Spouse Gloria Wright
v.
Julie Ann Wright SMITH, and Spouse, Jefferson Walton Smith, III appealed by Buncombe County Department of Social Services. No. 266P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Charlotte W. Nallan, for Buncombe County DSS. Lynne M. Holtcamp, for Billy & Gloria Wright. Clarke K. Wittstruck, Asheville, for Julie & Jefferson Smith.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 15th day of May 2006 by Appellant (Buncombe County DSS) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S.

7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th day of June 2006."
